ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:48:22. [Issue ID 977092]
ComicInfo.Writer: Mary Anne Evans,Mary Ann Evans,Mary Ann Evans
ComicInfo.Summary: Willow manages a strip club where she also performs. She is also a witch who channels the power focused on her from the men in the audience to perform magic. Seeing her act, Mr. Pucci claims he can get her into the movies, but she dismisses him. Outraged, he follows her and Eddie to a coven ceremony. When he is discovered, the witches turn him into a goat. Having taken care of Mr. Pucci, Willow and Eddie are back home when a package arrives with a crystal ball. The crystal ball delivers a message from Panacea, an old adversary.
ComicInfo.Characters: Eddie (a talking cat, Willow's familiar),Willow [Louene Willoughby],Panacea,Silvio Pucci
